title: Who beats Ahri?
body:
I'm having a HARD time beating this lame ass champ. Every time I face one, all they do is constantly shove the wave mindlessly and fish for that ONE charm that leads to me being deleted. Past 6 it's like forget it, she just clicks R and dashes to safety. That or she R's to safety then R's back in then R's back out after getting a kill. It's ridiculous. 

 I would rather not rely on jungle ganks (which for some reason NEVER happens for me) so I'd like to know, what's a good reliable way to beat people who play this stupid champ? I'm willing to open up my champ pool to a new champ so I can beat people who play this very annoying champ.

Anyone who can build RoA makes her suffer, in my experience. Malz, Morg, TF...If they can build RoA, she hates dealing with them, since she has basically no kill pressure against them. She does better against people who have to opt into MR instead of HP due to her Q's return doing true damage.

And, obviously, anyone with innate spellshields or other ability to ignore her E will do well, since she generally *needs* E to kill.

There are a lot of things to piss Ahri off, it's her early weakness, that's when you have to give it all if you don't want her to snowball after her level 6 - 9
It sounds crazy, but you can just play Garen mid against her. Build merc treads and other mr items as needed. Wait til she blows her charm, then run at her and punish with your silence.

What about when she has her stupid ult up? Dash dash dash away. Or back into the fight if her jungler shows up.

Her ult has a cooldown that's now actually pretty significant in lane, so even if she does ult away it won't save her. She also has nothing to defend herself once you land Q.

You also can ignore most of her burst with proper W timing, by using the tenacity to negate most of the CC and the damage reduction to ignore the burst, especially since she generally wants to cast Q right after E lands, so that you can't break free of charm first.

Even if you never kill her she will *never* be able to kill you unless she runs AD or goes Tear, because she'll just run out of mana before you finally die.

Malzahar is my perma ban regardless of what midlaner i play. It doesn't matter that he is immobile because he is one of the best champs to shut someone down. 

Malzahar existence forces players to gank less, or he will heavily damage the tower in just 1 wave and gain free gold off of it cause of tower plating (losing Mid lane tower is also a big deal compared to bot/top towers).

Forces players to burn 1300 gold on {{item:3140}} (a item that has no final build for ap champions) or die just cause of how easy it is for him to click R on someone so the rest of the team (or jungler in laning phase) can focus that player down. 

Then there is his reliable late game damage after he gets enough items.

I'm not saying he is broken, just a very annoying champion that i can't be bothered to deal with anymore unless I'm playing 5 man Flex, cause I can't trust the solo Q monkeys to be careful when Malzahar is in the game.

Also incase you're not already doing this: Do not use your Voidlings till the enemy mid laner uses their wave clear spell, that way they don't get one shot and can tear through the minions for you.

you dont play ziggs to beat ahri per say... 

you play ziggs due to range and clear and you can use his bombs for aoe slow and his explosive pack to help escape or slow ahri 

ahri is mid range mage/fighter she cant get close enough to ziggs if you play the wave/lane right and position using his range 

think of it like caitlyn using her superior range vs short ranged adcs

Just play ad mids and plow her good.

Camille is a hard counter to her safety her ult + she got passive shield + a massive dash that does damage, gives atk speed and stuns.

Kled, Irelia, Riven multiple instant dashes, CC and sustain.

Zed is Zed.

Avoid her charm with Lucian\Corki\Vayne\Kindred instant dashes and proceed to make minced meat out of her.

Good ap mids against her:

Fizz, Leblanc, vlad (she cannot prevent u from outscaling her), ekko (a bit of skill needed tho), azir (lot of skill needed, u can avoid here stuff but she can avoid ur's easily too)
Any more mobile champion or AD mid.
